### Data Processing

```{r}
dat.herb=read.csv("HerbaceousBiomass.csv",header=TRUE)

## 2008 year/season Subset
dat.08=dat.herb[dat.herb$Year==2008,]
dat.08.fall=dat.08[dat.08$Season=="Fall",]
dat.08.summ=dat.08[dat.08$Season=="Summer",]
## Treatment Subset 2008
wt.08=dat.08.fall[dat.08.fall$Treatment== "W",]
wt.08=dat.08.summ[dat.08.summ$Treatment== "W",]
dr.08=dat.08.fall[dat.08.fall$Treatment== "D",]
dr.08=dat.08.summ[dat.08.summ$Treatment== "D",]
ab.08=dat.08.fall[dat.08.fall$Treatment== "A",]
ab.08=dat.08.summ[dat.08.summ$Treatment== "A",]
##Treatment subsetted for mass
w.h.08








```
